Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Dispose of Evidence
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Choose a card in your hand to shuffle into your deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Just because you did it doesn't mean you have to be guilty.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Batty Guest
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Bat.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: His favorite food is chocolate cereal.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Call to the Stand
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Don't worry, there is a chair for you to sit in. It's very misleading.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Convincing Disguise
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (2) more. Infuse (@): Transform all friendly minions instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Okay gang, let's see who's really under the mask… *gasp* Old Man Bru'kan!?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Door of Shadows
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Draw a spell. Infuse (@): Add a temporary copy of it to your hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Upon arrival, please ring the doorbell of shadows, and wipe your shoes on the doormat of shadows before entering.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Dredger Staff
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Give minions in your hand +1 Health.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The dredger staff held the dredger knife and said, "Dredger bow before the Sire!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Flustered Librarian
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
Has +1 Attack for each
Imp you control.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A fairly sIMPle card.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Muck Pools
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Making a dredger is easier than you'd think. You don't need to worry about mucking it up!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Planted Evidence
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Discover a spell. It costs (2) less this turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: So you're telling me this wasn't Natural Causes?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Promotion
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Give a Silver Hand Recruit +3/+3 and Taunt.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: And with the new title of 'Golden Hand Recruit', you also get a pay raise!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Relic of Extinction
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deal $@ damage to a random enemy minion, twice. Improve your future Relics.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Faster than an asteroid, and just as effective.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sanguine Depths
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Deal 1 damage to a 
minion and give it 
+2 Attack.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: There may not be any skeletons in the closets at Castle Nathria, but there sure are souls in the basement.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sinful Sous Chef
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deathrattle: Add 2 Silver Hand Recruits to your hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: If this dinner party goes well, she thinks she has a good shot at being on Fel's Kitchen.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sinstone Totem
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: At the end of your turn, gain +1 Health.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: This one's heavier than the wooden totems. Mostly from the weight of your sins.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Suspicious Alchemist
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Side effects may include feeling totally fine! Don't even worry about it.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Suspicious Usher
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion. If your opponent guesses your __choice, they get a copy.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Oh please, let me take your jacket, luggage, and absurdly large shoulder pads."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: The Light! It Burns!
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Deal damage to a minion
 equal to its Attack.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Wait, if you're over there, then who's messing with the lights?!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Theft Accusation
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Destroy it after you play
a card copied from
the opponent.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Honey, where are my paaaaaaants?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Totemic Evidence
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Choose a basic Totem and summon it. Infuse (@ Totems): Summon all 4 instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Every totem is evidence of a tree's murder.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Anima Extractor
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Whenever a friendly
minion takes damage,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: After we are done you're welcome to help yourself to cookies and apple juice. Thank you for your donation!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Anonymous Informant
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play costs (0).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: It turns out she wasn't so great at keeping secrets after all.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Arson Accusation
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after your hero takes damage.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: We didn't start the fire!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Attorney-at-Maw
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Choose One - Silence a minion; or Give a minion Immune this turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: When the going gets tough, you don't want a criminal lawyer... you want a criminal lawyer...

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Bibliomite
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a card in your hand to shuffle into your deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: He did NOT want to cast a spell.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Carving Chisel
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: After your hero attacks, summon a random basic Totem.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Look at your stone. Visualize the totem within. Then gently...

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Castle Kennels
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Give a friendly minion +2 Attack. If it's a Beast, give it Rush.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Play dead! Oh…

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Class Action Lawyer
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, set _a minion's stats to 1/1.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Have you or a loved one ever been injured in a Consecration?"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Conqueror's Banner
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Reveal a card from each player's deck, three times. Draw any of yours that cost more.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Olgra, I love your new tapestry! Where did you get it?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Crazed Wretch
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Has +2 Attack and Charge while damaged.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Enrage is all the rage.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Crooked Cook
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]At the end of your turn, 
if you dealt 3 or more 
damage to the enemy 
hero, draw a card.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: There are many things not called poison which can kill a man. But in this case, it is poison.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Dew Process
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]For the rest of the game,
players draw an extra card
at the start of their turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: All part of dewing your dew diligence.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Double Cross
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Secret: When your opponent spends all their Mana, draw two cards.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Valeera revealed herself to be a double agent. At which point Maiev felt comfortable revealing that she also was a double agent. And then Scabbs announced to everybody that - get this - he was a double agent.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Frenzied Fangs
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Summon two 2/1 Bats. Infuse (@): Give them +1/+2.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: That's one stylish bat.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Frozen Touch
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deal $3 damage. Infuse (@): Add a Frozen Touch to your hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Is this what Bob was talking about when he said he served a drink to a Death Knight once?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Great Hall
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: It's fabulous! It's grand! It's, well it's really very nice.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Imp-oster
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Imp. Transform into a copy of it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: There is an imposter among us.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Impending Catastrophe
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Draw a card. Repeat for each Imp you control.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The imps end you, and the cats... well, they astrophe.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Kidnap
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, stuff it in a 0/4 Sack.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Check your coat, but don't check the coat closet.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Maze Guide
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "And if you look to your left, you'll see an even larger statue of Sire Denathrius!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Motion Denied
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, deal $6 damage to the enemy hero.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: DO NOT PASS GO. DO NOT COLLECT 200 GOLD.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Murder Accusation
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after another enemy minion dies.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Quote From Man Murdered: "What are you gonna do, murder me?"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Mysterious Visitor
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of cards copied from your opponent by (2).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Dave, we can tell this letter is fake - it's in your handwriting. And take off that stupid hood, you're embarrassing us.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Natural Causes
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 2/2 Treant.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: What if the suspect was framed? What if the murder weapon was... a plant?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Order in the Court
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Reorder your deck from
highest Cost to lowest
Cost. Draw a card.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "I have nothing BUT contempt for this court!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Perjury
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, Discover and cast a Secret from another class.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: By Liar be Perjured!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Priest of the Deceased
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Taunt Infuse (@): Gain +2/+2.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Funnel cakes? I haven't had those in years…"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Relic Vault
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: The next Relic you play this turn casts twice.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Holds Sire Denathrius' most prized possession - his teddy bear, Jeremy Bearimy.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Riot!
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Your minions can't be 
reduced below 1 Health 
this turn. They each attack 
a random enemy minion.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: No, Blizzard!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Roosting Gargoyle
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Jalapeñas!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Serrated Bone Spike
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a 
minion. If it dies, your 
next card this turn 
costs (2) less.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Draka, in an attempt to help, threw them a bone.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sinful Brand
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Brand an enemy minion.
Whenever it takes
damage, deal 1 damage
to the enemy hero.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: My brand!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sketchy Stranger
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret from another class.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: More of a 'Painted Stranger' if you ask me.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Solid Alibi
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Until your next turn, your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: That pillow knows too much…

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Spirit Poacher
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Always poach from your local spirit shelter.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sticky Situation
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 3/4 Spider with Stealth.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Now this is what I'd call..." "...just shut up."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Vile Library
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1 for each Imp you control.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: What type of vial library has 0 vials in it!?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Volatile Skeleton
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: These ice sculpures look so realistic!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Afterlife Attendant
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Your Infuse cards also Infuse while in your deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: AH! Wrist cramp!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Ashen Elemental
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Whenever your opponent draws a card next turn, they take 2 damage.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "The castle was nice but the fireplaces were too small - 2/5 stars"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Cathedral of Atonement
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Give a minion +2/+1 and draw a card.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: You'll actually find more than one tonement here.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Clear Conscience
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Give a friendly minion
+2/+3 and "Only you can
target this with spells
and Hero Powers."
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Do you swear to give the buff, the whole buff, and nothing but the buff, so help you Kyrestia?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Creepy Painting
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: After another minion dies, become a copy of it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: I do not like this painting, Harth. Its smug aura mocks me.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Dinner Performer
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion from your deck that you can afford to play.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: BANG!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Forensic Duster
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent's minions cost (1) more next turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: He had plenty of experience with dusting things from his time as a butler, so when a murder was committed he saw a real job opportunity!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Framester
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 'Framed' cards into the opponent's deck. When drawn, they Overload for (2).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Who put these beans in my pocket?!" -Man With Beans in Pocket

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Ghastly Gravedigger
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, choose a card in your opponent's hand to _shuffle into their deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Some people take their secrets to the grave.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Habeas Corpses
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Discover a friendly minion to resurrect and give it Rush. It dies at the end of turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Whoops, typo!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Hedge Maze
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: If you keep seeing a statue of the Sire, you’re not going in circles. There’s just so many of them.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Identity Theft
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Discover a copy of a card from your opponent's hand and deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Imbued Axe
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]After your hero attacks, give your damaged minions +1/+2. Infuse (@): +2/+2 instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Technically it's a Yet-to-be-Imbued Axe.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Incarceration
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 3 turns.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: To Blizzard jail with you!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Invitation Courier
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: After a card is added to your hand from another class, copy it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Sending mail via steward is soooo old school.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Jury Duty
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Summon two
Silver Hand Recruits.
Give your Silver Hand
Recruits +1/+1.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The most criminal thing about paladins is that they actually like jury duty.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Magnifying Glaive
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
draw until you have
3 cards.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Muckborn Servant
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Paladin card.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Party guests never tip as well as the patrons in Bob's tavern.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Murloc Holmes
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Solve 3 Clues about your opponent's cards to get copies of them.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: When you have eliminated the imfroggable, whatever remains, however uncroakable, must be the truth.
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGetDiamond: Earnable after purchasing the Murder at Castle Nathria Tavern Pass.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Nightcloak Sanctum
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Freeze a minion. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: For VIPs only. (Very Infused Person)

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Objection!
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Secret: When your opponent plays a _minion, Counter it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Sire, this is a Sindy's."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Party Favor Totem
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a random basic Totem. Infuse (@): Summon two instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: It's the gift (totem) that keeps on giving (totems)!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Pelagos
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]After you cast a spell 
on a friendly minion, set 
its Attack and Health to 
the higher of the two.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: He's a great judge of character.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Plot of Sin
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Summon two 2/2 Treants. Infuse (@): Two 5/5 Ancients instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: It's a great plot, but it's riddled with holes.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Primordial Wave
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Transform enemy minions 
into ones that cost (1) less 
and friendly minions into 
ones that cost (1) more.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A primordial hello to you too!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Prince Renathal
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Your deck size is 40.
Your starting Health is 35.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A lot of kids go through a rebellious phase, but Prince Renathal's was a bit extreme.
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGet: Earnable after opening a Murder at Castle Nathria card pack.
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGetGold: Earnable after purchasing the Murder at Castle Nathria Tavern Pass.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Relic of Phantasms
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
Summon two @/@
Spirits. Improve your future Relics.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Xy'mox chuckled. "You mean the Chaos Emerald?"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Service Bell
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Discover a Class card from your deck and draw all copies of it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The bell tolls for us! Waiter, we need more water!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Shadowborn
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of the highest Cost Shadow spell in your hand by (3).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: You merely adopted the shadows; I was born in them!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sinstone Graveyard
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Summon a @/@ Ghost. (Has +1/+1 for each other card you played this turn!)
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A graveyard in the realm of the dead; a bit redundant, don't you think?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Stag Charge
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Stag! You’re it!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Stewart the Steward
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Deathrattle: Give the next Silver Hand Recruit you summon +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: How many bites does it take to get the center of an hors d'oeuvre?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Suffocating Shadows
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]When you play or 
discard this, destroy a 
random enemy minion.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Reading is good for you," they said.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Suspicious Pirate
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: EVERY party should be a costume party.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: The Harvester of Envy
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: After you play a card copied from the opponent, steal the original.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Ah, permission shmermission! You can borrow anything you want, anytime, as long as if you give it back before it's missed. Everyone knows that! Right?"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Tight-Lipped Witness
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Secrets can't be revealed.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: People keep asking for her award-winning vegetarian chili recipe, but she just can't spill the beans.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Tome Tampering
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Shuffle 1-Cost 
copies of cards in your 
hand into your deck, 
then discard your hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: An overdue book calls for a do-over.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Vengeful Visage
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Secret: After an enemy minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it to attack the enemy hero.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The mirror shows us nothing less than the deepest, darkest desire of our hearts: to go face.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Weapons Expert
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, give it +1/+1. Otherwise, draw a weapon.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Yes, Your Honor, this appears to be some sort of blade."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Wild Spirits
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Summon two different Dormant Wildseeds. Make your Wildseeds awaken 1 turn sooner.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Wait, this card just released! It should be Standard Spirits!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Baroness Vashj
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]If this would transform
into a minion, summon
that minion instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Vashj was supposed to make an appearance in "The Sunken City," but after a freak accident in "Ashes of Outland," she ended up here.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Buffet Biggun
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two Silver Hand Recruits. Infuse (@): Give them +2 Attack and Divine Shield.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Look, I just want to know what kind of monster put raisins in this."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Burden of Pride
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Summon three 1/3 Jailers with Taunt. If you have 20 or less Health, give them +1/+1.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A group of burdens is called a pride.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Chatty Bartender
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]At the end of your turn, if you control a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "So a Venthyr, an Old God, and a Tauren walk into a bar…"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Cold Case
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Summon two 2/2 Volatile Skeletons. Gain 4 Armor.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: And that's why you keep your skeletons in your closet instead of your freezer.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Crud Caretaker
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/5 Elemental with Taunt.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: All it takes is a little love and a LOT of junk!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Demolition Renovator
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy an enemy location.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Look, the Sire said he wanted something more open concept..."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Dispossessed Soul
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: If you control a location, Discover a copy of a card in your deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: I'm afraid it came as a great shock to her when she died.
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGetGold: Unlocked with "Gone but Not Forgotten" Achievement.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Halkias
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Stealth. Deathrattle: Store Halkias's soul inside of a friendly Secret. It resummons Halkias when triggered.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Everybody tough until the sinstones start walking.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Incriminating Psychic
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Copy a random card from your opponent's hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Good news: He knows Kazakus's secret identity! Bad news: Now he's here.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Kryxis the Voracious
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your hand. Deathrattle: Draw 3 cards.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Tried intermittent fasting. It didn't stick.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Life Sentence
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
Remove a minion
from the game.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Also sentenced to laugh and love.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Mischievous Imp
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this. Infuse (@): Summon two copies instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Why is it when something happens, it is always you three?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Murlocula
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Lifesteal Infuse (@): This costs (0).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The best part of Murlocula is when he said "IT'S MRRGLIN' TIME" and totally mrrgled those guys.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Orion, Mansion Manager
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, cast a different Mage Secret and gain +2/+2.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The secrets of the universe are vast... and will be revealed sometime later this game.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Partner in Crime
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion at the end of your turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "You know what we need? Some rope." "That's stupid. Name one thing you'd need a rope for."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Private Eye
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck. _Combo: Cast 2 instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Eye see what you did there.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Prosecutor Mel'tranix
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent can only play their left- and right-most cards on their next turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Your Honor. The Defense isn't a clown, he's the whole circus."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Scuttlebutt Ghoul
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: No 'if's, 'and's, or 'scuttlebutt's'!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sightless Magistrate
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Both players draw until they have 5 cards.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Does "Justice is Blind" still apply with Spectral Sight?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Stonebound Gargon
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Rush Infuse (@): Also damages the minions next to __whomever this attacks.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Really good at "stay."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: The Stonewright
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Totems have +2 Attack.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: She wrights stone better than she reads it.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Widowbloom Seedsman
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Nature spell. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Sometimes a blue thumb is better than a green one.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: All Fel Breaks Loose
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Summon a friendly Demon that died this game. Infuse (@ Demons): Summon three instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Maybe we should have made the bars closer together…

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Ara'lon
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Summon one of each Dormant Wildseed.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: If I had a nickel for every time a Hunter Legendary minion in Castle Nathria summoned three different companions, I'd have two nickels - which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it happened twice.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Boon of the Ascended
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Give a minion +2 Health. Summon a Kyrian with its stats and Taunt.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Ascension is not some external power granted to you, it is the power you find within yourself.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Clean the Scene
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Destroy all minions with 3 or less Attack. Infuse (@): 6 or less.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Not even the holy Light can get anima out of white silk.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Elitist Snob
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: For each Paladin card in your hand, randomly gain Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Rush, or Taunt.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "I heard the Sire invited a Murloc! How dreadful!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Famished Fool
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Infuse (@): Draw 3 instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: He's not hungry for food, he's starving for attention!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Lady Darkvein
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Shades. Each gains a Deathrattle to cast your last Shadow spell.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: You're so vein. I bet you think this flavor text is about you.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Mawsworn Bailiff
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 4 or more Armor, gain +4/+4.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Bailiff, bring in the dancing lobsters!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Muck Plumber
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: ALL minions cost (2) more.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: If you drink muck, you go to the Maw before you die.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Necrolord Draka
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Equip a @/3 Dagger. (+1 Attack for each other card you played this turn!)
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: We originally planned on giving Rogue a Legendary minion called "The Moon", but SOMEONE jumped in the frame.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Shadehound
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Whenever this attacks, give your other Beasts +2/+2. Infuse (@ Beasts): Gain Rush.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: This Shadehound wasn't just a good boy. He was the best.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Shadow Waltz
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Summon a 3/5 Shadow with Taunt. If a minion died this turn, summon another.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: They're dancing to one of Rin's demonic symphonies. Her music might not be famous now, but just you wait!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sinrunner
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Blanchy was said to be an affectionate and well-behaved horse in life. How she ended up in Revendreth? We're too afraid to ask.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Soul Seeker
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Swap this with a random minion from your opponent's deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The Soul Seeker's job is to look for a snitch.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Steamcleaner
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Destroy ALL cards in both players' decks that didn't start there.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Business is slow since the anima shortage began. Things just don't get stained like they used to!
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGetGold: Earnable on the Murder at Castle Nathria Reward Track.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Stoneborn Accuser
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Infuse (@): Gain "Battlecry: Deal 5 damage."
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "I SAW THEM VENT, I SWEAR!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Bog Beast
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/4 Muckmare with Taunt.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: I'm sure at least one of those bones is from an actual beast.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Contract Conjurer
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Costs (3) less for each Secret you control.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: This document looks illegally binding.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Death Blossom Whomper
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Draw a Deathrattle minion and gain its Deathrattle.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: We call her Audrey II. She was named after her mother.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Deathborne
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
Deal $2 damage to all minions. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton 
for each killed.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Kel'Thuzad thinks adding a silent 'e' at the end of words makes them sound cooler.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Decimator Olgra
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: FOUND HER!
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 Murder at Castle Nathria Legendary cards.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Defense Attorney Nathanos
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Trigger and gain its Deathrattle.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Your Honor, my client was simply trying a new tree trimming technique!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Imp King Rafaam
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Resurrect four friendly Imps. Infuse (@): Give your Imps +2/+2.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Not even death can stop Rafaam from pursuing a life of crime.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Masked Reveler
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 copy of another minion in your deck.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "It's party time! P-A-R-T-Why? Because I gotta!"

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Relic of Dimensions
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Draw two cards 
and reduce their Cost 
by (@). Improve your 
future Relics.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A glaive is a glaive, but a mystery box could be anything! It could even be a glaive!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sylvanas, the Accused
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion. Infuse (@): Take control of it instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Turns into 'Sylvanas, the Infused'.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Theotar, the Mad Duke
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Discover a card in each player's hand and swap them.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "I'm afraid you've gone mad! You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best souls are."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Divine Toll
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Shoot 5 rays at random
minions. They give friendly
minions +2/+2, and deal $2
damage to enemy minions.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Never send to know for whom the bell tolls.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Huntsman Altimor
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Gargon Companion. Infuse ({0}): Summon another. _Infuse ({1}): And another!
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: He loves all his Gargons equally. (Hecutis is his favorite and it's not close.)

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Red Herring
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Taunt Your non-Red Herring minions have Stealth.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: He's got gill-ty written all over him!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Remornia, Living Blade
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Rush After this attacks, equip it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Was it the lead pipe... the candlestick... or the unhinged, sentient, bloodthirsty sword?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Scribbling Stenographer
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: A truly staggering 180 scribbles per minute!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sinfueled Golem
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Infuse (@): Gain stats equal to the Attack of the minions that Infused this.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: That poor golem is going to be stuck as a guard forever. He can never get a head!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: The Countess
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 3 Legendary Invitations to your hand.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: 3 Legendary Invitations, AH AH AH!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Topior the Shrubbagazzor
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you cast a Nature spell, summon a 3/3 Whelp with Rush.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: They got a dragon that burns 1000 gallons of anima a week.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Artificer Xy'mox
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover and cast a Relic. Infuse (@): Cast all three instead.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "The anticipation to use this relic is killing me! Though, it will more likely kill you."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Collateral Damage
Murder at Castle Nathria.text:
[x]Deal $6 damage to three 
random enemy minions. 
Excess damage hits 
the enemy hero.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Criminal Lineup
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Choose a friendly minion. Summon 3 copies of it. Overload: (2)
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Number 1, could you please sing the opening to "I Want It That Way"?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Kael'thas Sinstrider
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Every third minion you play each turn costs (0).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: You heard about Kael'thas? That's messed up, right?

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Kel'Thuzad, the Inevitable
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect your Volatile Skeletons. Any that can't fit on the battlefield instantly explode! @(@)
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Looks like Kel'Thuzad is borrowing some of Mr. Bigglesworth's nine lives.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Nightshade Bud
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Choose One - Discover a minion from your deck to summon; or a spell to cast.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: It actually thrives in partial sunlight.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Party Crasher
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Throw a random minion from your hand at it.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: "Do you ever wonder why you don't get invited anywhere?" "… no, not really."

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sesselie of the Fae Court
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a minion. Reduce its Cost by (8).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: They claim they're from the Fae Court, but that might be a Fae Kout.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Torghast Custodian
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: For each enemy minion, randomly gain Rush, Divine Shield, or Windfury.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Why is it a common? Well we couldn't make it a LEGendary minion!

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Insatiable Devourer
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Battlecry: Devour an enemy minion and gain its stats. _Infuse (@): And its neighbors.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: You're not you when you're anima-starved.
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGetGold: Earnable after purchasing the Murder at Castle Nathria Tavern Pass.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Convoke the Spirits
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Cast 8 random Druid spells (targets chosen randomly).
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: The spirits prefer to convoke when there's some hot gossip to discuss.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Gigantotem
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Totem Golem's uncle, gone too soon.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Sire Denathrius
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Lifesteal. Battlecry: Deal 5 damage amongst enemies. Endlessly Infuse (@): Deal 1 more.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: History has a way of altering villains so that we can no longer see ourselves in them. Unfortunately for the Venthyr, they all look like Sire Denathrius.
Murder at Castle Nathria.howToGet: Earnable after opening a Murder at Castle Nathria card pack.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: Stoneborn General
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: [x]Rush __Deathrattle: Summon an ___8/8 Gravewing with Rush._
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: Leads with an iron fist and a stony demeanor.

Murder at Castle Nathria.name: The Jailer
Murder at Castle Nathria.text: Battlecry: Destroy your deck. For the rest of the game, your minions are Immune.
Murder at Castle Nathria.flavor: At one point, The Jailer served as Arbiter over the souls of the Shadowlands. He was the epitome of an unbiased, righteous judge of character. WAS.
